column1: Kata Robata////My wife and I came here for a date night.  We shared the mixed ceviche
column3: and pork gyoza.  She had the Longhorn maki
column6: and chopped scallop).  The mixed ceviche was the best thing we ordered: the leche de tigre was good
column7: and we liked the combination of octopus and white fish.  The kobe beef was tender and delicious
column8: so I'd also recommend that.  However
column9: we really came to order sushi
column10: but we weren't impressed by either the maki or the nigiri sushi.  All the food prices were high.  At least the ceviche and the kobe were tasty.  The sushi wasn't anything special
column11: so we didn't think it was worth the price tag.
